attributes.action: To make more homeless shelters to suply them with a place of living
attributes.background: To place more funding into homelessness and help them with finding a job and a place to say for a while

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding to house and support the homeless: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614065

Help the homeless by funding a shelter and at least one healthy meal per day: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611379
